title: Grudging Respect
text: She can be so infuriating - and she's usually right.
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: Thea is at the same location. Cost: Menas is angry.
effectb: Effect: Remove all discord for Menas's party.

title: Necessary Evils
text: The world is not a pretty place.
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: Fuscus is at the same location.
effectb: Effect: +2 progress on a task at this location.
effectc: Burn effect: Cost: Lower a faction disposition track by two.
effectd: Effect: Raise a different faction disposition track by one.

title: Grizzled Veteran
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: Menas is at a Military location.
effectb: Effect: +2 progress on a task at this location.
effectc: Burn effect: Defend against an obstacle without taking a condition.

title: Whispering Spirits
effectb: If Oniri is at the same location, may make Menas shaken to burn card.

title: Soft Pity
text: Seriously? Drop the loner act, kid.
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: Keel is at the same location.
effectb: Effect: +2 progress on a task at this location.

title: White Lies
effecta: Play effect: Cost: Fuscus is exhausted.
effectc: Burn effect: Everyone else in Fuscus's party is angry.

title: Lavender Society
text: Oh, her? I have friends all over.
effecta: Play effect: Cost: Spend a secret.
effectb: Effect: Move a character to any location.

title: Manipulations
effectb: Lower a disposition track by two, rais a different disposition track by two.

title: One Voice
text: We have one mind when it comes to the future of Red Bank.
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: Menas is at the same location. Cost: Spend 4 fortune.
effectb: A test that Menas is involved in is easy.

title: The Conciliator
text: I can't let my burdens get in the way of our goal.
effecta: Play effect: Cost: Thea is frustrated.
effectb: Effect: Remove all discord from Thea's party.
effectd: Effect: Increase a faction disposition track by one.

title: Priorities
text: We cannot squander our time while the Empire is preparing for war.
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: Thea is at a Red Bank location.

title: Envoy
effecta: Play to remove a timer on an alliance mission.

title: Tough Love
effecta: Requirement: Menas is involved in a test with Keel.

title: Work Better Alone
effecta: Play effect: Requirement: No character is at any of the mission locations for the same mission Keel is on.
effectb: Effect: +2 progress on a task at this location.

title: Master of Gadgets
text: You'll see why it's on fire shortly.
effecta: Play effect: Cost: Spend a secret.
effectb: Effect: Gain one success on a test.
effectc: Burn effect: Cost: Keel is wounded.

title: Alone in the Dark
effecta: Play when Keel is alone at an Imperial location. Spend 4 secrets. Remove all apotheosis.

title: I'm Always in Pain
effectb: Spend 4 Mana. Give Oniri a condition to remove a condition from someone else in the party.

title: Happier Alone
effectb: Play when Oniri is alone at a Quest location. Oniri is Exhausted.

title: Necromantic Mana Well
effectb: Oniri is Shattered. Increase Mana track by one.
